visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent the monthly average rainfall for a year, with each month as a category on the x-axis. The chart should also have custom colors for the series and additional configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and it includes a background color and specific margins for better visual appeal. The x-axis categories represent the months of the year, and the y-axis is labeled 'Rainfall (mm)'. Both axes have styled labels with a specified color and font size. The data series represents the monthly average rainfall, with each data point corresponding to a month. The series is named 'Rainfall' and uses a custom color. Additionally, the legend is enabled with styled text to match the overall theme of the chart.
